name: W H A V E S.004 | D R A K O
description: [DRAKO] ​Whaves are kinetic orbs of energy provisioned by the Gods of Edah and scattered across the universe. They power the Achilia portals which allow the ancestors of H=n’ots to travel across parallel dimensions in time and space. The portals have been long lost and are awaiting to be discovered once again. ​​Only the bravest of travelers collect whave orbs to which discover the portals of our ancestors and commence their journey throughout Edah. Travelers ​Those who brave the unknown and collect the correct set of whaves will discover and unlock an Achilia portal to further their journey across Edah. The portals have been unused for generations. Stories have been passed down the H=n'ots lineage to tell of their great power. What they look like remains a mystery unless.. Ak’hala tikém (peace be with you traveler)
